post:
After Jacksonville, Florida, we have now even launched our KVM VPS in **Las Vegas**, our other locations are New York and Los Angeles

Looking Glass:
Network Looking Glass for LA – https://lg.hosteons.com
Network Looking Glass for NY – http://lg.ny.hosteons.com
Network Looking Glass for Jacksonville (JAX) – https://lg.jax.hosteons.com
Network Looking Glass for Las Vegas – https://lg.vegas.hosteons.com

Bandwidth: 500GB
Location: LA, NY, JAX, Vegas

$21 per year

24x7 Support

All popular modes of payments are accepted.
